metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13240 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GLPI before 9.4.1. After a successful password reset by a user, it is possible to change that user's password again during the next 24 hours without any information except the associated email address.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
